md:
giải nghĩa từ "punctuality" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Punctuality** (noun)

* Meaning: The quality of being on time or doing things at the right time.
* Vietnamese: Sự đúng giờ, tính đúng giờ.

Example sentence: "Punctuality is an important quality for a successful businessperson."

* Related words: timely, on time, prompt, late, delay.

Note: Punctuality is a noun that refers to the habit of being on time or doing things at the right time. It is an important quality in many aspects of life, including business, education, and personal relationships.
